name: Blooming Candle: Pure as a Lotus
description: Candle lights as transparent as lotus blooms. During the Lantern Rite, they can be seen in every street in Liyue. These candles are made using a traditional local method of firing glaze and come with wicks of exceptional endurance. The light is a warm, dark orange that is nonetheless clear, lending a unique sense of intimacy to the people of the city.
